data.oai_dc:dc: The thermal quality in study sites. time.tset: number of hours the thermal model was between 32.2 C and 26.0 C (preferred temperature range of ornate tree lizards) for each julian day a model recorded datasite: number (1:10) identifying the sitehab: character identifying whether the thermal model was in the upland (u) or wash (w)month: number identifying the month
